high_descs: Move across the room to the wood desk where the clock is
Pick up the clock towards the back on top of the desk
Carry the clock while adjusting to face the lamp on top of the desk
anns.task_desc: Hold a clock while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Turn around, walk to the desk.
Pick up the clock by the book.
Walk to the right to the end of the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the end of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at the clock in the light.

high_descs: Turn around and face the desk.
Pick the red clock on the right up from the desk.
Move to the right side of the desk and face the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a clock and turn on a lamp.
